name: RED CITY (J-TROGA STUDIOS)
description:
A imperial inspired city builder City builder game about staying in power with a general imperial style

There are 4 main resources

- population 

- money 

- materials 

- control 

You are able to build 4 types of buildings

Residential 

- increases population - decreases control 

Commercial 

- increases money - decreases materials - decreases population 

Industrial

- increases materials - decreases money

Control

- increases control - decreases materials

Other kinda important things

3D Models - Ryan Martinka 

Music - Vitae Music

Programming - Owen Eggleston

The Arsonist - Lil Jacob

If the UI goes off the screen press f11 twice
